Package niagara.query_engine

Interface Summary
Instrumentable  
Schedulable Something that can be scheduled to run in a Niagara thread
SchedulablePlan A SchedulablePlan is an executable DAG of query operators
SchemaProducer Producers of tuple schemas
 

Class Summary
ActiveQueryList The ActiveQueryList class is used to store the queries that are active in the query engine.
ContainTreeNode A tree of ContainTreeNode forms a containment tree.
ContainUnit A ContainUnit corresponds to a SchemaUnit.
ExecutionScheduler The class ExecutionScheduler schedules optimized queries (represented by the optimized logical operator tree) for execution.
PhysicalOperatorQueue  
PhysicalOperatorThread  
QueryEngine The QueryEngine class executes queries written in XML-QL and returns an XML result.
QueryInfo The QueryInfo class stores all data associated with a query and provides access to that data.
QueryOptimizer This class is used to optimize a logical plan and return an optimized logical plan
QueryQueue The QueryQueue class stores queries as they are entered into the QueryEngine.
QueryResult QueryResult is the class at the client that interacts with the output stream of the query
QueryThread The QueryThread class is used to run queries after they are entered into the query engine system through executeQuery(String).
TupleSchema A tuple schema maps attribute/variable names to tuple positions.
 

Exception Summary
NoDataSourceException Exception thrown when there are no data source for running the query i.e.
PushSEQueryException Exception thrown when extracting and pushing search engine queries from query engine queries
